caption.center: Frank NEWMAN et al. v. Patrick T. BOYLE et al.

opinion.attorneys:
Letts, Quinn Licht, Daniel J. Murray, Joseph DeAngelis, Nicholas Trott Long, Providence, for petitioners.
DeSimone Del Sesto Law Corporation, Herbert F. DeSimone, Gerard McG. DeCelles, Providence, for respondents.
opinion.opinion_text:
[1] ORDER [2] The order granting the request for permanent injunction is an appealable order and petitioners have appropriately filed a notice of appeal. Therefore, the petition for writ of certiorari is denied.
[3] DORIS, J., did not participate.
